ygData.subject: Re: Song Taunt
ygData.msgSnippet: Flash of light is a mega taunt, I call it my cleric taunt.  I use it all the time when i helping out lower lvls and sometimes in my regular when I am trying to
ygData.messageBody:
Flash of light is a mega taunt, I call it my cleric taunt. I use it all
the time when i helping out lower lvls and sometimes in my regular when
I am trying to spread out the damage. (Our warrior does a great job of
taunting, and between him and our bard, I almost never even get nicked)

> From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
>
>
> A paladin friend scoffs whenever he hears about others who can't taunt
> mobs, and swears by flash of light as a spell that taunts better than
> taunt.

--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
